sourcesContent: import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { CourseService } from 'src/app/services/course.service'; import { CourseComponent } from '../course/course.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-courses', templateUrl: './courses.component.html', styleUrls: ['./courses.component.css'] }) export class CoursesComponent { course : any ; coursesTab: Course[] = []; coursesTab: any=[]; constructor(private courseService: CourseService) { } ngOnInit() { this.courseService.getAllCourses().subscribe( (response) => { this.coursesTab = response; console.log("coursesTab : ", this.coursesTab); }, (error) => { console.log('La requete Get a échoué') }); } deleteCourse(course: CourseComponent) { const index = this.coursesTab.indexOf(course); if (index !== -1) { this.coursesTab.splice(index, 1); } console.log("newcoursesTab : ", this.coursesTab); } }
